title: Part 578 - Instructions-operating Revenue Accounts
content:
Part 578 - Instructions-operating Revenue Accounts

State Regulations
§ 578.1 - Purpose of operating revenue accounts
§ 578.2 - Basis of credits to operating revenue accounts
§ 578.3 - Commissions on water sales
§ 578.4 - Water supplied without direct charge
§ 578.5 - Water, steam or other power used by utility

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
